valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Sun 28 Sep 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Mon 29 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low south FitzRoy 1000 expected Spain 1013 by midnight tonight

Wind
Southeasterly 5 to 7, occasionally gale 8 at first in east, veering westerly or southwesterly 3 or 4 later, becoming variable 2 to 4 later.

Moderate or rough, occasionally very rough at first in north.
Weather
Showers or rain.
Visibility
Good, occasionally poor until later.

Trafalgar.text:
thwesterly 4 to 6, occasionally 3 in south and east. In north, cyclonic gale 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 at first.
Sea state
In south, rough or very rough, occasionally moderate at first in east. in north, rough or very rough, occasionally high at first.
Weather
Thundery rain then showers.
Visibility
In south, good, occasionally poor at first. In north, good, occasionally poor at first.
